ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie project stats
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Easy, if you have been a good boy and not killed any froggies...OR have killed a few and have Cinda s, OR have invis. Gauntlets drop at both the live side
ygData.messageBody:
>Everyone feels like a target at this level

:o)

> Um ... how tough to get? I need to get a pair for the lambent gauntlet
> quest.

Easy, if you have been a good boy and not killed any froggies...OR have
killed a few and have Cinda's, OR have invis.

Gauntlets drop at both the live side and dead side zone and are no drop
(grieves only at the Dead side). I think it is easier to get them at the
live side, just dance right in (bring muffins, milk and bandages in case the
group you are going to be a parasite upon needs em) and ask nicely if you
might loot the gauntlets if they don't need or can't use them. On both
servers I got them within minutes of arriving.

Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
